tool_description: Our API can estimate salary ranges, classify job descriptions and extract information from job descriptions.
name: Job Descriptions API
title: Job Descriptions API

api_list.name: estimateSalaryRange
api_list.description:
Estimates a salary range.
It returns a 404 if it cannot estimate the salary range.
The salary_type value can be "yearly", "monthly", "weekly", "daily" or "hourly".
